mapper.select: SELECT s.id as studentId, s.name as studentName, g.course_id as courseId, c.name as courseName, g.score, c.semester FROM student s JOIN course_selection cs ON s.id = cs.student_id JOIN course c ON cs.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN grade g ON s.id = g.student_id AND c.id = g.course_id WHERE c.id = #{courseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grade (student_id, course_id, score) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{score})
mapper.select: SELECT s.id as studentId, s.name as studentName, s.class_id as className, g.score as score, g.created_at as updateTime FROM student s LEFT JOIN grade g ON s.id = g.student_id AND g.course_id = #{courseId} WHERE s.id IN ( SELECT student_id FROM course_selection WHERE course_id = #{courseId} )
mapper.update: INSERT INTO grade (course_id, student_id, score, created_at) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{studentId}, #{score}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE score = #{score}, created_at = #{updateTime}
UPDATE grade SET is_published = 1 WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
